title: After I Transmigrated as a Mermaid, I Transmigrated Back - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Supernatural   Yuri
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Character Growth   Contracts   Demons   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Overpowered Protagonist   Power Couple   Returning from Another World   Special Abilities   Spirits   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Vampires   Wealthy Characters
author: Shen Ri Shi   沈日十
description:
After five years of being a mermaid that hid deep within the cold sea, Zhao Xiaokui had finally returned back to her human body.

Mobile games, anime and manga, my idols, and a peaceful society, I have returned!

But on her very first day at home, 

“Congratulations on your achievement: Killing a water demon.”

“Congratulations on your achievements: Killing a vampire.”

Zhao Xiaokui: “…wow, this welcome ceremony is really chic.”

Fu~ this really was a world full of peace...>
